name: Ext_R4B_DetectedIssue_status
title: Cross-version Extension for R4B.DetectedIssue.status for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents DetectedIssue.status from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/DetectedIssue|4.3.0 for use in FHIR R5.

element.definition: Indicates the status of the detected issue.
element.comment: `DetectedIssue.status` maps to R5 `DetectedIssue.status`. The value set relationship of SourceIsBroaderThanTarget is INCOMPATIBLE for a required binding on a `code` type in this direction. So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
element.isModifierReason: This element is labeled as a modifier because it is a status element that contains status entered-in-error which means that the resource should not be treated as valid

element.definition: Indicates the status of the detected issue.
element.comment: `DetectedIssue.status` maps to R5 `DetectedIssue.status`. The value set relationship of SourceIsBroaderThanTarget is INCOMPATIBLE for a required binding on a `code` type in this direction. So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

binding.description: Indicates the status of the identified issue.
